markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Cantrip](/Traits.aspx?ID=22)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 629 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A spell you can cast at will that is automatically heightened to half your level rounded up.
name: Cantrip
